label: Hidden→Active observation boundary
reason: Decoherence threshold is QM axiom (Copenhagen/decoherence interpretation boundary). The quantum-to-classical transition is foundational to QM, not a PM-specific prediction. PM uses standard decoherence theory as input. quantum_decoherence_solver.py calculates coherence times for Orch-OR but does not verify G55.
note: FOUNDATIONAL: Hidden→Active observation boundary. This is a framework assumption, not an empirical prediction.
